explanation: [0-0] A person's arm is outstretched to the left, holding a black tactical shovel. In the background, two wooden targets can be seen with bullet holes in them. Behind the targets are some trees and buildings. There is black text on a white background at the top of the screen.
[0-2] Next, the hand throws the shovel forward forcefully. The shovel hits the target in front of it, then bounces back and is caught by a hand.
[0-2] Next, the hand throws the shovel forward forcefully. The shovel hits the target in front of it, then bounces back and is caught by a hand.
[2-4] Immediately, the hand throws the shovel forcefully again. This time, the shovel successfully nails itself to the target.
